###  Thryv to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences

November 13, 2024

DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--  [Thryv® Holdings, Inc.](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thryv.com&esheet=54151718&newsitemid=20241113420751&lan=en-US&anchor=Thryv%26%23174%3B+Holdings%2C+Inc.&index=1&md5=91e78ebfcb30a160d3d89afad6db70ff) (NASDAQ:THRY) (“Thryv'' or the “Company”), the provider of the leading small business software platform, announced today members of its management team will host 1:1 meetings at the following upcoming investor conferences: 

**RBC Global Technology, Internet, Media, and Telecom Conference** Date: Tuesday, November 19 th , 2024 Location: Intercontinental New York Barclay, New York, New York 

**Needham SaaS 1X1 Virtual Conference** Date: Thursday, November 21 st , 2024 

**Wolfe Research Small and Mid-Cap Conference** Date: Thursday, December 5 th , 2024 Location: 1X1 Virtual Meetings 

**About Thryv**

Thryv Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:THRY) is the provider of the leading do-it-all small business software platform that empowers small businesses to modernize how they work. It offers small business owners everything they need to communicate effectively, manage their day-to-day operations, and grow — all in one place — giving up to 20 hours back in their week 1 . Thryv’s customizable platform features three centers: Thryv® Command Center, a freemium central communications hub, Thryv Business Center™ and Thryv Marketing Center™. Approximately 300,000 businesses globally use Thryv software to connect with local customers and take care of everything they do, start to finish. For more information, visit [www.thryv.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thryv.com&esheet=54151718&newsitemid=20241113420751&lan=en-US&anchor=www.thryv.com&index=2&md5=cc3636fa75f361aeb8ecb5c1b947091e). 

1 Based on Thryv survey sample of 181 clients. Calculations assume a 40-hour work week. Results may vary. 

**Media Contact:** Julie Murphy Thryv, Inc. 617.967.5426 Julie.murphy@thryv.com  **Investor Contact:** Cameron Lessard Thryv, Inc. 214.773.7022 Cameron.lessard@thryv.com

Source: Thryv

[View All News](https://investor.thryv.com/news/default.aspx)

## Privacy Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [Cookie Policy Link](https://corporate.thryv.com/privacy/#5)

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

We, our Service Providers and other third parties use cookies and other tracking technologies to assist with navigation and operation of our website, analyze your use of our website, and count visits to improve the performance of our site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you allow “Performance Cookies” you agree to the use of cookies for the foregoing purposes.

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

###  Reminder: Thryv to Host Analyst Day on December 3, 2024 in New York City

November 26, 2024

DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--  [Thryv Holdings, Inc.](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thryv.com%2F%3Futm_source%3Dpublic-relations%26utm_medium%3Downed%26utm_campaign%3Dpress-release%26utm_content%3Dproduct&esheet=54158187&newsitemid=20241126573133&lan=en-US&anchor=Thryv+Holdings%2C+Inc.&index=1&md5=767b4402309b3fc77310bedd84bc03df) (NASDAQ:THRY) (“Thryv'' or the “Company”), the provider of the leading small business software platform, today provided additional details for the company’s upcoming Analyst Day on Tuesday, December 3, 2024, at the NASDAQ MarketSite located at 151 West 43 rd Street, Floor 10, New York City, New York. 

From 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. EST, Chairman & CEO Joe Walsh, President Grant Freeman, Chief Financial Officer Paul Rouse, and other members of Thryv’s executive team will present on Thryv’s recent acquisition of Infusion Software Inc. (dba Keap®), business performance, outlook, and key strategic priorities. Participants in the New York City area can register to attend in-person [here](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thryv.com%2Fanalyst-day-registration-2024%2F&esheet=54158187&newsitemid=20241126573133&lan=en-US&anchor=here&index=2&md5=91e6d8201e7b247df74e8436b1949b13). For participants joining remotely, the live webcast can be accessed [here](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.webinar.net%2FZmpO76D1GKV&esheet=54158187&newsitemid=20241126573133&lan=en-US&anchor=here&index=3&md5=4b755003f6fbd07b2cfc494c048fd577). 

**About Thryv®**

Thryv Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:THRY) is the provider of the leading do-it-all small business software platform that empowers small businesses to modernize how they work. It offers small business owners everything they need to communicate effectively, manage their day-to-day operations, and grow — all in one place — giving up to 20 hours back in their week 1 . Thryv’s customizable platform features three centers: Thryv® Command Center, a freemium central communications hub, Thryv Business Center™ and Thryv Marketing Center™. Approximately 300,000 businesses globally use Thryv software to connect with local customers and take care of everything they do, start to finish. For more information, visit [thryv.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fthryv.com&esheet=54158187&newsitemid=20241126573133&lan=en-US&anchor=thryv.com&index=4&md5=cd6f321c302354bb99bb24809a94d030). 

1 Based on Thryv survey sample of 181 clients. Calculations assume a 40-hour work week. Results may vary. 

**Media Contact:** Julie Murphy Thryv, Inc. 617.967.5426 Julie.murphy@thryv.com

**Investor Contact:** Cameron Lessard Thryv, Inc. 214.773.7022 cameron.lessard@thryv.com

Source: Thryv

links.content:
[Skip to main content](#maincontent)

# News Details

Investor Menu

## Site Search

[View All News](https://investor.thryv.com/news/default.aspx)

###  Thryv Announces Winners of First Small Business Excellence Awards

November 20, 2024

**_Winners delivered notable business management and growth results_ **

DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--  [Thryv®](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thryv.com%2F&esheet=54155514&newsitemid=20241120494365&lan=en-US&anchor=Thryv%26%23174%3B&index=1&md5=0b68219e2cd94ff1eafa74f60f7a444e) (NASDAQ: THRY), the leading do-it-all small business software platform, today announced the winners of its inaugural Small Business Excellence Awards. The awards recognize small businesses for their notable achievements in establishing business excellence using Thryv solutions. The awards feature three categories focusing on small business evolution, productivity and growth. 

The winners are: 

Small Business Growth Award : When Britney and Marc David made the bold decision to leave their careers and start a home inspection business, [TrueMark Home Inspections](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.truemarkfl.com%2Fhome-inspection-services&esheet=54155514&newsitemid=20241120494365&lan=en-US&anchor=TrueMark+Home+Inspections&index=2&md5=8a99d708c4c174a9fb51f049919b2002), the couple prioritized the need for robust support and strategic management, leading them to Thryv Business Center™ and Thryv Marketing Center™. With Thryv’s suite of tools and personalized support, the Davids quickly established operations with an efficient estimate and invoicing process, professional website and high-impact marketing campaigns, setting a solid foundation for growth. As their new business flourished, so did their entrepreneurial spirit. They soon expanded, opening a second business, [Custom Wood & Design Co](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.customwoodanddesignco.com%2F&esheet=54155514&newsitemid=20241120494365&lan=en-US&anchor=Custom+Wood+%26amp%3B+Design+Co&index=3&md5=138f16b4d47f3c85bdc354415d971cf1)., in the spring of 2024. “Having such strong growth can be hard for a small business to manage but with Thryv we have everything in place to build on that growth and create strong customer relationships. We’re booked several months in advance,” said the Davids. 

Small Business Evolution Award : Kevin Binkley, owner of tax return business [The Balance Sheet](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thebalancesheetservice.com%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwY2xjawFzvrZleHRuA2FlbQIxMAABHZ5LJXtkDN2C43HcPUm4hhHPyi7XTLJ_Nb69Euo5IQHcmnqmXxgZ1AS6YA_aem_9PoZF7Q7lLt4zRJcZ-Nalg&esheet=54155514&newsitemid=20241120494365&lan=en-US&anchor=The+Balance+Sheet&index=4&md5=a42b04fa08c14d9ba1baa5702f9baa89), earned this award in recognition of the successful transition of his business operations to the cloud through Thryv Business Center. A former Thryv Marketing Services customer, Binkley transitioned to Thryv’s CRM, using its features to the fullest. In the process he has tripled his revenue, acquired 45+ Google reviews, added staff and has a new office in Albuquerque, New Mexico. “I work with numbers for a living and my revenue numbers don’t lie,” said Binkley. “Using Thryv Business Center has completely transformed how I run my business, from establishing an online presence to building efficiencies and increasing my responsiveness to customers. It’s been a game-changer.” 

Small Business Productivity Award : Julie McDaniel, owner of [Artful Cakery by Julie](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.artfulcakery.com%2F&esheet=54155514&newsitemid=20241120494365&lan=en-US&anchor=Artful+Cakery+by+Julie&index=5&md5=a6756c59e2f6edb3cd31db51b050dbd5), earned this award for personifying the successful entrepreneurial experience. McDaniel credits her use of Thryv Business Center for growing her wedding and custom cake business by 100%, an incredible achievement that is even more notable in a challenging economy. McDaniel credits Thryv for getting her business organized by putting streamlined processes in place, from building an online presence to communicating with customers to accepting payments. “In the wedding cake business, your reputation is everything. With Thryv I now have a beautiful, professional website and a rapidly growing number of 5-star reviews. In 2023 I set a goal to get 20 wedding cake orders. Thanks to help from Thryv, I made 54 wedding cakes that year!” said McDaniel. 

**About the Thryv Small Business Excellence Awards**

Client referrals drive nearly half of Thryv’s new business, making opportunities to share the value small businesses are receiving from the platform a powerful marketing tool for both the award winners and for Thryv. Winners receive discounts on Thryv subscriptions, award logos for their websites and professional videos they can use to market their business. The Thryv Small Business Excellence Awards will be presented annually and all Thryv clients are eligible to participate in the nomination process. Nominations for the 2025 awards will be open in May of 2025. 

**About Thryv**

Thryv Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:THRY) is the provider of the leading do-it-all small business software platform that empowers small businesses to modernize how they work. It offers small business owners everything they need to communicate effectively, manage their day-to-day operations, and grow — all in one place — giving up to 20 hours back in their week 1 . Thryv’s customizable platform features three centers: Thryv® Command Center, freemium central communications hub, Thryv Business Center™ and Thryv Marketing Center™. Approximately 300,000 businesses globally use Thryv software to connect with local customers and take care of everything they do, start to finish. For more information, visit [www.thryv.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thryv.com&esheet=54155514&newsitemid=20241120494365&lan=en-US&anchor=www.thryv.com&index=6&md5=683f9d088769315df2b4fa791c4a43fb). 

1 _Based on Thryv survey sample of 181 clients. Calculations assume a 40-hour work week. Results may vary._

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241120494365r1&sid=q4-prod&distro=nx&lang=en)

**Media Contact:** Julie Murphy Thryv, Inc. 617.967.5426 julie.murphy@thryv.com  **Investor Contact:** Cameron Lessard Thryv, Inc. 214.773.7022 cameron.lessard@thryv.com

Source: Thryv

links.title: Executive Management
links.content:
# Meet the team behind it all.

Thryv® provides local business automation software and digital and print marketing solutions to more than 400,000 local businesses, helping them compete and win in today’s on-demand economy.

# Thryv Leadership.

Learn about the Thryv Management Team. By doing what is right and operating with integrity, we build credibility and trust with our employees, clients, stockholders and the community.

[![Joe Walsh](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201000%201000'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](/about/corporate/joe-walsh)

Joe Walsh

Chairman and Chief Executive Officer

Joining Thryv in October 2014, Walsh serves as Chairman and CEO. He is charged with leading the overall company strategy and operations. A respected leader in the industry, Joe brings a wealth of experience to Thryv with previous leadership roles in a variety of companies…

[Learn more](/about/corporate/joe-walsh)

[![Paul Rouse](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201000%201000'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](/about/corporate/paul-rouse/)

Paul Rouse

Chief Financial Officer

Paul Rouse, chief financial officer, executive vice president and treasurer joined Thryv from Apple and Eve, LLC, where he served as the chief financial officer for one of the largest privately held juice companies in the United States.

[Learn more](/about/corporate/paul-rouse/)

Grant Freeman

President

Grant Freeman is President at Thryv ensuring Thryv is a transformative and efficient customer-centric company. Grant’s prior title was Chief Customer Officer focusing on improving the client and employee experience to create highly engaged and happy clients…

Lesley Bolger

Chief Legal Officer and Human Resources

Chief Marketing Officer

Rees Johnson

Chief Product Officer

As Thryv’s Chief Product Officer, Rees Johnson is responsible for leading and driving product development, innovation, lifecycle, and a global product roadmap. He ensures that Thryv’s customizable platform is well-designed, incorporating the latest technology advancements…

James McCusker

Chief Revenue Officer

Chief Operation and Information Officer

John Wholey, chief operation and information officer and executive vice president, joined Thryv from hibu, where he served as the head of U.S. operations. John was responsible for all operational aspects of the business from order capture thru production/fulfillment, publishing, distribution, customer service and sales support for all print and digital product offerings…
